original_text: Hazael said, ‘I am only an ordinary man, sir. I am not more important than a dog! How could I ever do great things like that?’ Elisha answered, ‘The Lord has shown me that you will become the king of Syria.’
korean_text: 하사엘이 이르되 당신의 개 같은 종이 무엇이기에 이런 큰일을 행하오리이까 하더라 엘리사가 대답하되 여호와께서 네가 아람 왕이 될 것을 내게 알게 하셨느니라 하더라

sentences.original_text: I am only an ordinary man, sir
I am not more important than a dog
How could I ever do great things like that
sentences.korean_translation: 어떻게 제가 그런 위대한 일을 할 수 있겠습니까

sentences.original_text: that you will become the king of Syria
